question: 裕福
sourceMnemonic: You have such <kanji>abundant</kanji> <kanji>luck</kanji>! If you have abundant luck, you're probably also <vocabulary>wealthy</vocabulary>, because lots of <vocabulary>wealth</vocabulary> equals lots of luck, right?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
